timeline.message: Fix: Fixing the config field retrieval so state changes don't have lasting impacts. Updating the UI to make sure the correct descriptor is used.

timeline.bodyText: For User's that have READONLY access we were changing the state of the fields. This change was being persisted even when you switched user's. So now we create a copy of the list to prevent the changes from effecting the in memory fields.
timeline.author: jamesrichard91

timeline.message: Fix: Fixing the config fields for the Descriptor metadata. Refactoring the descriptor lookup in the javascript.
